content:
IWithTrafficRoutingMethod Interface

Definition

The stage of the traffic manager profile update allowing to specify the traffic routing method for the profile.

In this Article

public interface IWithTrafficRoutingMethod

Methods

WithPerformanceBasedRouting()

Specify that end user traffic should be routed based on the geographic location of the endpoint close to user.
WithPriorityBasedRouting()

Specify that end user traffic should be routed to the endpoint based on its priority i.e. use the endpoint with highest priority and if it is not available fallback to next highest priority endpoint.
WithTrafficRoutingMethod(TrafficRoutingMethod)

Specify the traffic routing method for the profile.
WithWeightBasedRouting()

Specify that end user traffic should be distributed to the endpoints based on the weight assigned to the endpoint.
